title: Ep 96: It's Not Gray, It's Sparkles with Devachan founder Lorraine Massey
itunes:title: Ep 96: It's Not Gray, It's Sparkles with Devachan founder Lorraine Massey
itunes:subtitle: Lorraine Massey, gray hair guru (and founder of curly girl mecca Devachan) stops by to talk all things silver. Before that: We chat about Fashion Week trends; over-exfoliation; and of course, the Deciem drama we can't stop watching.
description:
Lorraine Massey, gray hair guru (and founder of curly girl mecca Devachan) stops by to talk all things silver. Before that: We chat about Fashion Week trends; over-exfoliation; and of course, the Deciem drama we can't stop watching.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
